title: CONTAINERYARD / PANEL
description: very likely we need this panel to make mega-rich-light-bendy-guy container move.

dialogueTree.title: Crane Control Panel: "A rusting control panel with severa..."
dialogueTree.english: A rusting control panel with several knobs. The words *Marche* and *Arrêt* are -- very, very slightly -- even more faded with use.
dialogueTree.polish: Rdzewiejący panel sterowania z kilkoma gałkami. Słowa *Marche* i *Arrêt* są teraz minimalnie bardziej wytarte od zużycia.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Іржавее панэль кіравання з некалькімі ручкамі. Словы *Marche* і *Arrêt* цяпер мінімальна больш сцерліся ад выкарыстання.

links.title: You: "Press *Marche*."
links.english: Press *Marche*.
links.polish: Wciśnij *Marche*.
links.belarusian: Націсніце *Марш*.

links.title: Crane Control Panel: "No screech of metal when you push t..."
links.english: No screech of metal when you push the button this time. Only silence, as the crane remains in its state of dormancy.
links.polish: Tym razem po wciśnięciu przycisku próżno nasłuchiwać metalicznego zgrzytu. Żuraw pozostaje w milczącym stanie uśpienia.
links.belarusian: На гэты раз пасля націску кнопкі марна слухаць металічны скрыгат. Журавель застаецца ў маўклівым стане сну.

links.title: Crane Control Panel: "With a loud grind the crane shifts..."
links.english: With a loud grind the crane shifts overhead, moving a massive metal container through the air...
links.polish: Żuraw przesuwa się nad twoją głową z głośnym zgrzytem, przenosząc potężny, metalowy kontener...
links.belarusian: Журавель рухаецца над тваёй галавой з гучным скрыгатам, пераносячы магутны металічны кантэйнер...

links.title: Crane Control Panel: "... and with a surprisingly quiet t..."
links.english: ... and with a surprisingly quiet thunk, the crane places the container down.
links.polish: ...i z zaskakująco cichym stuknięciem umieszcza go na podłożu.
links.belarusian: ...і з нечакана ціхім стукам ён кладзе яго на зямлю.

links.title: Inland Empire: "This crane was built with a purpose..."
links.english: This crane was built with a purpose which has now been fulfilled -- to move *this* container.
links.polish: Żuraw zbudowano w celu, który został już zrealizowany – przeniesienia *tego* kontenera.
links.belarusian: Журавель быў пабудаваны з мэтай, якая ўжо была рэалізавана — перамяшчэння *гэтага* кантэйнера.

links.title: You: "What's inside the container?"
links.english: What's inside the container?
links.polish: Co jest w kontenerze?
links.belarusian: Што знаходзіцца ў кантэйнеры?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Who can say? All you know is -- it'..."
links.english: Who can say? All you know is -- it's special.
links.polish: Kto wie? Wiesz tylko jedno – jest wyjątkowy.
links.belarusian: Хто ведае? Ты ведаеш толькі адно – ён унікальны.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can't see how that was worth the..."
links.english: "I can't see how that was worth the ruckus..." He looks at the crate. "Except for seeing the crane in action. Which, I admit, was satisfying."
links.polish: „Nie wiem, czy całe to zamieszanie było tego warte...” – stwierdza, spoglądając na skrzynię. „Ale przynajmniej zobaczyliśmy żuraw w akcji. To – muszę przyznać – było satysfakcjonujące”.
links.belarusian: «Не ведаю, ці варта была ўся гэтая мітусня...» – зазначае, гледзячы на скрыню. «Але, прынамсі, мы ўбачылі журава ў дзеянні. Гэта – мушу прызнаць – было задавальняльным».

links.title: You: "Understood. Let's get back to the p..."
links.english: Understood. Let's get back to the panel.
links.polish: Rozumiem. Wróćmy do tego panelu.
links.belarusian: Разумею. Вярнуцца да гэтага панэля.

links.title: Inland Empire: "If only you knew..."
links.english: If only you knew...
links.polish: Gdybyś tylko wiedział...
links.belarusian: Каб ты толькі ведаў...

links.title: Interfacing: "The harbour sleeps as the strike ra..."
links.english: The harbour sleeps as the strike rages in the distance. The crane can rest again, now that its purpose has been fulfilled.
links.polish: Port śpi, w oddali zaś wrze strajk. Żuraw może znów odpocząć – cel jego istnienia został zrealizowany.
links.belarusian: Порт спіць, а ўдалечыні кіпіць страйк. Журавель можа зноў адпачыць – мэта яго існавання была дасягнута.

links.title: You: "Its purpose? What do you mean?"
links.english: Its purpose? What do you mean?
links.polish: Cel istnienia? Co masz na myśli?
links.belarusian: Мэта існавання? Што ты маеш на ўвазе?

links.title: Interfacing: "Moving *this* container, of course...."
links.english: Moving *this* container, of course. For this purpose it was built; for this purpose it has acted. And now it will rest.
links.polish: Przeniesienie *tego* kontenera, rzecz jasna. Po to został zbudowany, to właśnie uczynił. A teraz odpocznie.
links.belarusian: Перанос *гэтай* кантэйнер, вядома. Для гэтага ён і быў пабудаваны, гэта якраз тое, што ён зрабіў. А зараз адпачне.

links.title: You: "Understood. Let's get back to the p..."
links.english: Understood. Let's get back to the panel.
links.polish: Rozumiem. Wróćmy do tego panelu.
links.belarusian: Я comprendu. Вярнуцца да гэтай панэлі.

links.title: Interfacing: "The rusty control panel grows warm..."
links.english: The rusty control panel grows warm to the touch. Then grows cold. It is finished.
links.polish: Zardzewiały panel sterowania robi się ciepły w dotyku, później zaś ponownie chłodny. Zakończył działanie.
links.belarusian: Іржавы пульт кіравання робіцца цёплым навобмацак, а потым зноў халодным. Ён завяршыў працу.

links.title: Perception (Smell): "A faint smell of burning rubber rea..."
links.english: A faint smell of burning rubber reaches your nostrils. A short-circuit.
links.polish: Do twoich nozdrzy dociera słaba woń spalonej gumy. Krótkie spięcie.
links.belarusian: Да вашых ноздраў даходзіць слабое пах спаленай гуммы. Кароткае замыканне.

links.title: You: "Press *Arrêt*."
links.english: Press *Arrêt*.
links.polish: Wciśnij *Arrêt*.
links.belarusian: Націсніце *Arrêt*.

links.title: Crane Control Panel: "The crane does not return to its or..."
links.english: The crane does not return to its original position. It does not move at all.
links.polish: Żuraw nie wraca do swojej pierwotnej pozycji. W ogóle się nie porusza.
links.belarusian: Журавель не вяртаецца ў сваю першапачатковую пазіцыю. Увогуле не рухаецца.

links.title: Crane Control Panel: "The crane stands tall: proud, erect..."
links.english: The crane stands tall: proud, erect and *still*.
links.polish: Żuraw wznosi się wysoko, dumny, wyprostowany i *nieruchomy*.
links.belarusian: Журавель узвышаецца высока, гонарлівы, прамы і *нерухомы*.

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.english: [Leave.]
links.polish: [Odejdź].
links.belarusian: [Адыдзі].

dialogueTree.title: Crane Control Panel: "A rusting control panel with severa..."
dialogueTree.english: A rusting control panel with several knobs. Two buttons, marked *Marche* and *Arrêt*, are faded with use. It seems to control the large crane above -- a container is attached to its hook block.
dialogueTree.polish: Rdzewiejący panel sterowania z kilkoma gałkami. Widnieją na nim dwa wytarte od zużycia przyciski opisane *Marche* i *Arrêt*. Zdaje się, że służą do sterowania dużym żurawiem nad twoją głową, do haka którego zaczepiony jest kontener.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Рыжавеючая панэль кіравання з некалькімі ручкамі. На ёй ёсць дзве затёртыя ад выкарыстання кнопкі з надпісам *Marche* і *Arrêt*. Здаецца, яны служаць для кіравання вялікім кранам над вашай галавой, да якога падкачаны кантэйнер.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "*Marche* -- On. *Arrêt* -- Off."
links.english: *Marche* -- On. *Arrêt* -- Off.
links.polish: *Marche* – włącz. *Arrêt* – wyłącz.
links.belarusian: *Марш* – уключыць. *Арэ* – выключыць.
